alert.note: Alert for Boyd; Holt (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 01 at 8:13PM CDT until August 01 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Holt County in north central Nebraska... Eastern Boyd County in north central Nebraska... * Until 900 PM CDT. * At 813 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Spencer, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Spencer, Lynch, Gross, Bristow, Monowi, Spencer Dam, Parshall Bridge State Wildlife Management Area, Redbird State Wildlife Management Area and Anncar. This includes the following highways... Highway 281 between mile markers 202 and 220. Highway 12 between mile markers 116 and 144. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
